description: The map shows excess or deficit of elemental nitrogen and phosphorus globally at a 5 arc minute resolution. These data represent the year 2000 but were calculated from input data sets ranging from 1994-2001.
title: Nitrogen Balance on Landscape
citation: West, P. C., Gerber, J. S., Engstrom, P. M., Mueller, N. D., Brauman, K. A., ES Cassidy, PM Engstrom, M Johnston, GK MacDonald, DK Ray, Siebert, S. (2014). Leverage points for improving global food security and the environment. Science, 345(6194), 325-328. http://science.sciencemag.org/content/345/6194/325.abstract
